title: (x) Wedding font - Bickham Script {Kyle}
content: I have been looking for this font everywhere! I see it all the time on wedding invitations websites but can't find it to download and use myself. I would appreciate any help! Thank you. ![wedding invitation](http://web.archive.org/web/20130716213827im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32822.jpg)
author: aspst22

comments.content:
Hi Alexis,   
   
This looks like Bickham Script to me, you can buy it from Adobe.
Be sure to get the Bickham swash caps or you won't be able to to do the embellished caps (the uppercase F, for example).

These days Adobe sells only the OpenType version. You'll need an OpenType savvy application (such as Illustrator CS or InDesign) to take full advantage of the extra goodies. However, if you have one of those, the extra stuff is all built in.   
   
That being said, there is an even more cool version of Bickham Script in the works, but we have not given a release date for Bickham Script Pro.   
   
Regards,   
   
T
